title: Dictionary Comprehensions Practice
instructions: Practice creating and transforming dictionaries using comprehensions with filters and conditions.
hints: Use comprehension: {x: x**2 for x in range(1, n+1)}
Filter with condition: {k: v for k, v in d.items() if v >= min_value}
Use k.upper() if isinstance(k, str) else k for keys
This requires loop with setdefault or defaultdict, not pure comprehension
